solution_line_template: If Anika is {anika_current_age} now, in {years_in_future} years, she'll be {anika_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{anika_current_age}+{years_in_future}={anika_age_in_15_years}>>{anika_age_in_15_years} years old.

At {anika_current_age}, Anika is {anika_maddie_ratio} the age of Maddie, meaning Maddie is {anika_maddie_ratio}*{anika_current_age}=<<{anika_maddie_ratio}*{anika_current_age}={maddie_current_age}>>{maddie_current_age} years.
In {years_in_future} years, Maddie will be {maddie_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{maddie_current_age}+{years_in_future}={maddie_age_in_15_years}>>{maddie_age_in_15_years} years old.
Their total age in {years_in_future} years will be {maddie_age_in_15_years}+{anika_age_in_15_years}=<<{maddie_age_in_15_years}+{anika_age_in_15_years}={total_age_in_15_years}>>{total_age_in_15_years}
Their average age in {years_in_future} years will be {total_age_in_15_years}/{number_of_people}=<<{total_age_in_15_years}/{number_of_people}={average_age_in_15_years}>>{average_age_in_15_years}
